com.google.template.soy.shared.restricted
Interface SoyPrintDirective

All Known Subinterfaces:
SoyJavaSrcPrintDirective, SoyJsSrcPrintDirective, SoyTofuPrintDirective
All Known Implementing Classes:
BidiSpanWrapDirective, BidiUnicodeWrapDirective, EscapeHtmlDirective, EscapeJsDirective, EscapeUriDirective, IdDirective, InsertWordBreaksDirective, NoAutoescapeDirective
public interface SoyPrintDirective

Superinterface for a Soy print directive.

Important: Implementing this interface by itself does nothing. Your directive implementation class needs to implement some of all of this interface's subinterfaces.

Method Summary
 String getName()
          Gets the name of the Soy print directive.
 Set<Integer> getValidArgsSizes()
          Gets the set of valid args list sizes.
 boolean shouldCancelAutoescape()
          Returns whether the appearance of this directive on a 'print' tag should cancel autoescape for that 'print' tag.
 

Method Detail

getName

String getName()
Gets the name of the Soy print directive.

Returns:
The name of the Soy print directive.

getValidArgsSizes

Set<Integer> getValidArgsSizes()
Gets the set of valid args list sizes. For example, the set {0, 2} would indicate that this directive can take 0 or 2 arguments (but not 1).

Returns:
The set of valid args list sizes.

shouldCancelAutoescape

boolean shouldCancelAutoescape()
Returns whether the appearance of this directive on a 'print' tag should cancel autoescape for that 'print' tag.

Returns:
Whether the appearance of this directive on a 'print' tag should cancel autoescape for that 'print' tag.
